text: Eric Clemons is a freelance sportscaster. He worked for SportsCenter as an anchor and reporter. His other jobs include: * College Football on Fox Sports Net sideline reporter * NFL on Fox play-by-play * WALA-TV sports anchor/sports reporter * WHDH-TV sports anchor/reporter * WFBS-TV sports anchor * WVUE-TV sports director Category:College football broadcasters Category:National Football League broadcasters Category:Living people Category:1959 births Category:American sports commentators
title: Eric Clemons
